sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-main> <router-view> </router-view><v-main>
</template>

<style lang="scss">

#app {
  font-family: 'Avenir', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  border: 10px solid rgba(4,4,4, 1);
  background: orange;
  box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 16px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
  max-width: 1920px;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
</style>
  <!--<v-app id="inspire" style="background: #EDE7F6;" v-resize="onResize">
    v-card color="blue" max-width="340" class="pa-6 mx-auto">
      <v-card-title> A detective's journey </v-card-title>
    </v-card>
    <v-main>
      <router-view> </router-view>
    </v-main>
    
    <v-row justify="center" align="center">
      
      <v-list 
        align="center"
        justify="stretch"
        class="rounded-xl"
        color="orange lighten-2"
        rounded
        
      >
          <v-list-item
            class="ma-auto "
            v-for="section in sections"
            :key="section.title"
            color="blue"
            two-line
            link
            :to="section.to"
          >
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title v-text="section.title" ></v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>

          </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-row>
  </v-app>


<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({ 
      selectedSection: 1,
      sections: [
        { title: 'Quiz', to: '/'},
        { title: 'Game', to:'/about'}
      ] 
      }),
      methods: {
        onResize () {
          this.windowSize = { x: window.innerWidth, y: window.innerHeight }
        },
      }
  }
</script>!-->
